author: Natalie Musumeci
title: Blood-spattered woman is wife of American killed in London attack
text:
The blood-spattered blonde – her eyes wide in shock – who quickly became the face of the London terror attack has been identified as the wife of the American who was one of three killed.
Melissa Payne Cochran’s face was plastered on the many front pages of newspapers, including the New York Post, following Wednesday’s deadly rampage .
She was photographed lying battered and bloodied on the Westminster Bridge after an ISIS-inspired madman barreled an SUV down the span , striking dozens.
Her husband, Kurt Cochran, 54, a father of two, was killed during the horrifying bridge attack .
Melissa, who suffered a broken leg and rib, was recovering at a hospital, a relative said on Facebook Thursday in announcing her husband’s death.
The couple was in Europe celebrating their 25th wedding anniversary and were set to return back to the US on Thursday, according to a statement from Melissa’s brother Clinton Payne.
“Our family is heartbroken to learn of the death of our son-in-law, Kurt W Cochran, who was a victim of Wednesday’s terrorist attack in London. Kurt was a good man and a loving husband to our daughter and sister, Melissa,” the statement said.
“Melissa also received serious injuries in the attack and is being cared for in the hospital. We express our gratitude to the emergency and medical personnel who have cared for them and ask for your prayers on behalf of Melissa and our family.”
The statement continued, “Kurt will be greatly missed, and we ask for privacy as our family mourns and as Melissa recovers from her injuries.”
Two others – including a police officer – were killed in the attack before the assailant was shot dead by police.
